pr_title: Parts for small support vehicle ammo tracking

timeline.message: Added parts for tracking infantry ammo for small SVs.
Add correct part for small SV ammo bins.
Include weapon in the name of InfantryAmmoStorage.
Create parts for ammo bins stored in LOC_NONE.
Configure ammo for small SVs with inferno options.
Remove excess ammo as part of loading partner bin.
Move dialog Strings to properties file.
Use unit name as ammo dialog title.
Report missing standard bin (which shouldn't happen) instead of throwing NPE.

timeline.bodyText: I didn't think we normally updated unit definitions in MekHQ?
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: No, but I copied it over for testing and accidentally committed it. I noticed a couple commits later and didn't think it made enough of a difference to go back and revert it.
replies.author: neoancient
